text: Mission to Mars is a 2000 American Canadian French science fiction adventure movie directed by Brian De Palma and was based on the Disney's theme park of the same name. It stars Gary Sinise, Tim Robbins, Don Cheadle, Connie Nielsen, Jerry O'Connell, Kim Delaney, Armin Mueller-Stahl and Bill Timoney. It was distributed by Touchstone Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2000 science fiction movies Category:2000 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Canadian adventure movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:French adventure movies Category:French science fiction movies Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies directed by Brian De Palma Category:Movies set in the 2020s Category:Movies set in the future Category:Movies about astronauts Category:Movies set in outer space
title: Mission to Mars
